chart_description: This chart shows the number of process and thread creations for a system. It can help identify processes or applications that are consuming more system resources and contributing to system load.

dimension_descriptions._do_fork: This dimension measures the number of new processes created by the system call 'fork'. A higher value for this dimension indicates more new processes have been created.
dimension_descriptions.sys_clone: This dimension measures the number of new system threads created by the system call 'clone'. A higher value for this dimension indicates more new threads have been created.
